message.caption: Jenkins User Conference 2014
message.blurb: Jenkins User Conference in this year will be held in Boston, Berlin, Israel, San Francisco Bay Area, and in Australia/New Zealand. See you soon

message.caption: Bring Jenkins to the Enterprise
message.blurb: Jenkins Enterprise by CloudBees helps enterprises optimize large Jenkins installations through professional support + special plugins. Evaluation is free.

message.caption: Jenkins Operations Center by CloudBees
message.blurb: Efficiently manage, monitor, secure and update large + decentralized Jenkins deployments. Share build resources between masters. Free Eval.

message.caption: You build great features. We get them to your users.
message.blurb: Automate your deployments, provision & scale environments, run & analyze your Agile test suites. Start delivering features faster.

message.caption: Jenkins is great on my desktop, but... Enterprise?
message.blurb: You were smart and brought in Jenkins. Now it's taking off. As your reward, you get to roll it out to the enterprise. BDS has the expertise to help you do it right.
